name: CATharsis (MIYAKOpubl)
description:
STORY:
"CATharsis" is a visual novel and adventure game set in the present day.
This is a story about suddenly turning into a cat, meeting a mysterious chicken, and spending your days prowling around and getting petted.
(It is not an otome game.)

GUIDE:
In this game you advance the story through clicking.
There are multiple endings, and the outcomes change according to the choices you make.
You can find hints about the choices you must make, as well as two main endings.

FEATURES:

  • 2 endings
  • 3+1CGs
  • Unlockable 3 short episodes

PLAYMOVIE:

KEYBORD SHORTCUTS:

  • Ctrl:Skip
  • Esc:Close window 
  • B:Display backlog 
  • M:Open menu 
  • Enter:Continue reading 
  • A:Autoplay

SPECS:

  • ОS: Windows 7/8/10  
  • Memory: 4 GB
  • Disc space: 300 MB
  • Display resolution: 1280×720px
